com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.checks.regexp

Class MultilineDetector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.checks.regexp.MultilineDetector

  • class MultilineDetector
extends Object
    A detector that matches across multiple lines.
